name: The Final Life
description:
NOTE: on some browsers, like Firefox, you can allow audio. If you do that, you will hear Mountain Trials by Joshua McLean.

Thumbnail made by Giacomo Borsellino: https://giacomoborsellino.netlify.app/index.html

This is a little demo project about a tribal warrior versus an immortal robot. But it's not truly immortal... he has 10 lives! And every time you beat him...he will return stronger...

Things to know:

SPACE: A (use a selected move)

Dpad: Dpad (select a move)

HP: You and the boss have this points. You will lose if you lose all the HP and you can make the enemy lose his HP so you can win.

Charge: The enemy has a charge bar. If full, the enemy can become more stronger or heal himself.

ATK: the amount of damage you and the boss can do.

SPD: Fills the TIME bar faster, so you can do more turns.

TIME: If on 100%, you can move, the same applies to the enemy.

NOTE: You can't have a charge bar. Also only for you the player you have a max of 100 HP, 40 ATK and 40 SPD.

SKILLS:

Attack: attack the enemy and makes him weaker. Can decrease 1 ATK or SPD of the enemy, along with some HP. You will lose 1 ATK and SPD;

Heal HP: Heal some HP based on ATK, 1 ATK and 1 SPD;

Boost: Increase 3 SPD, but you will lose 1 ATK;

Power: Increase 3 ATK, but you will lose 1 SPD;

Defeat the enemy 10 times for winning!
